languages.text: По легенде, сам Бог-Император благоволил свое{mf|му|й} наместни{mf|ку|це}, даруя {mf|ему|ей} чудесную силу повергать зло и храня от вражьих происков. Впрочем, распространителей сих слухов, как и тех, кто требовал признания в Вольном Торговце живо{mf|го|й} свято{mf|го|й}, преследовали агенты Экклезиархии, боровшиеся с нежелательными для Империума сплетнями.

Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.
languages.original_text: По легенде, сам Бог-Император благоволил свое{mf|му|й} наместни{mf|ку|це}, даруя {mf|ему|ей} чудесную силу повергать зло и храня от вражьих происков. Впрочем, распространителей сих слухов, как и тех, кто требовал признания в Вольном Торговце живо{mf|го|й} свято{mf|го|й}, преследовали агенты Экклезиархии, боровшиеся с нежелательными для Империума сплетнями.

traits.locale_text: The legend goes that God-Emperor himself favoured his Liege, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil and guarding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that Ecclesiarchy persecuted those, who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded the Rogue Trader to be proclaimed a Living Saint, fighting against rumours unwanted in the Imperium.

The legend goes that God-Emperor himself favoured his Liege, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil and guarding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that Ecclesiarchy persecuted those, who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded the Rogue Trader to be proclaimed a Living Saint, fighting against rumours unwanted in the Imperium.

Legend has it that the God-Emperor himself favoured his Liege, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded the Rogue Trader to be proclaimed a living saint.

Legend has it that the God-Emperor himself favoured his Liege, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded the Rogue Trader to be proclaimed a living saint.

Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.

Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.

languages.text: 传言称，神皇十分青睐于祂在扩区的守护者，赐予了{mf|他|她}奇迹般的力量来粉碎邪恶，保护{mf|他|她}免受敌人阴谋的伤害。但现实情况却是——国教为了控制帝国境内的舆论，经常迫害那些传播此类荒诞故事的人，逮捕那些要求将行商浪人封为活圣人的民众。
languages.original_text: Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.

traits.locale_text: 传言称，神皇十分青睐于祂的总督，赐予了{mf|他|她}神奇的力量来粉碎邪恶，保护{mf|他|她}免受敌人阴谋的伤害。但现实情况却是，国教为了控制帝国的舆论，经常迫害那些传播此类荒诞故事的人，逮捕那些要求将行商浪人封为活圣人的民众。

languages.text: Der Legende zufolge hatte der Gottimperator selbst {mf|dem Lehnsherren|der Lehnsherrin} seine Gunst gewährt und {mf|ihn|sie} mit einer wundersamen Kraft gesegnet, durch die {mf|er|sie} das Böse vernichten konnte und vor feindlichen Intrigen geschützt war. In Wahrheit aber wollte die Ekklesiarchie das Narrativ im Imperium kontrollieren und verfolgte daher alle, die solche Märchen verbreiteten — und alle, die forderten, dass {mf|der Freihändler zum|die Freihändlerin zur} lebenden Heiligen erklärt wird.
languages.original_text: Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.

traits.locale_text: Der Legende zufolge hatte der Gottimperator selbst {mf|dem Lehnsherren|der Lehnsherrin} seine Gunst gewährt und {mf|ihn|sie} mit einer wundersamen Kraft gesegnet, durch die {mf|er|sie} das Böse vernichten konnte und vor feindlichen Intrigen geschützt war. In Wahrheit aber wollte die Ekklesiarchie das Narrativ im Imperium kontrollieren und verfolgte daher alle, die solche Märchen verbreiteten — und alle, die forderten, dass {mf|der Freihändler zum|die Freihändlerin zur} lebenden Heiligen erklärt wird.

languages.text: La légende raconte qu'{mf|il|elle} comptait parmi les intendants favoris de l'Empereur-Dieu, qui lui avait octroyé un pouvoir miraculeux permettant de détruire le mal et de {mf|le|la} protéger de ses ennemis. En vérité, l'Ecclésiarchie, dans sa lutte de contrôle des rumeurs au sein de l'Imperium, persécutait ceux qui osaient relayer ce genre d'histoires invraisemblables ou appelaient à la canonisation {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de son vivant.
languages.original_text: Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.

traits.locale_text: La légende raconte qu'{mf|il|elle} comptait parmi les suzerains favoris de l'Empereur-Dieu, qui lui avait octroyé un pouvoir miraculeux permettant de détruire le mal et de {mf|le|la} protéger de ses ennemis. En vérité, l'Ecclésiarchie, dans sa lutte de contrôle des rumeurs au sein de l'Imperium, persécutait ceux qui osaient relayer ce genre d'histoires invraisemblables ou appelaient à la sanctification {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de son vivant.

languages.text: Según la leyenda, el mismísimo Dios Emperador favorecía a Su guardián: le otorgó el poder milagroso de aplastar el mal y {mf|le|la} protegió de las conspiraciones enemigas. La verdad es que la Eclesiarquía, en su lucha por controlar la narrativa del Imperium, persiguió a todos los que contaban estas historias y a quienes exigían que se proclamara a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente como sant{mf|o|a} en vida.
languages.original_text: Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.

traits.locale_text: Según la leyenda, el mismísimo Dios Emperador favorecía a su Señor{mf||a}: le otorgó el poder milagroso de aplastar el mal y {mf|le|la} protegió de las conspiraciones enemigas. La verdad es que la Eclesiarquía, en su lucha por controlar la narrativa del Imperium, persiguió a todos los que contaban estas historias y a quienes exigían que se proclamara a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente como sant{mf|o|a} en vida.

languages.text: 伝説によれば、神帝陛下は自身の給仕を寵愛し、悪を打ち砕く奇跡的な力を与え、敵の陰謀から守ったという。しかし、帝国の歴史を支配しようとする帝国聖教会は、そのような作り話を広める者を迫害し、また自由開拓者は生ける聖人であると宣言せよと要求する者たちを迫害したというのが真実である。
languages.original_text: Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.

traits.locale_text: 伝説によれば、神帝陛下は自身の給仕を寵愛し、悪を打ち砕く奇跡的な力を与え、敵の陰謀から守ったという。しかし、帝国の歴史を支配しようとする帝国聖教会は、そのような作り話を広める者を迫害し、また自由開拓者は生ける聖人であると宣言せよと要求する者たちを迫害したというのが真実である。

languages.text: Efsanelerde; Tanrı İmparator Hazretleri'nin hizmetkârını bizzat kutsadığı, ona kötülüğü yok etme gücü ihsan edip düşman kumpaslarından koruduğu yazıldı. İmparatorluk'ta neye inanılacağını kontrol etme mücadelesi veren Ekleşiarşi ise bu tip söylentileri yayanları da Hür Tacir'in yaşayan bir aziz ilan edilmesini talep edenleri de cezalandırdı.
languages.original_text: Legend has it that the God-Emperor Himself favoured His steward, granting {mf|him|her} a miraculous power to crush evil, and shielding {mf|him|her} from enemy plots. The truth is that the Ecclesiarchy, in its battle to control narratives in the Imperium, persecuted those who spread such tall tales, as well as those who demanded that the Rogue Trader be proclaimed a living saint.

traits.locale_text: Efsaneler, Tanrı İmparator Hazretleri'nin; hizmetkârını bizzat kutsadığını, ona kötülüğü yok etme gücü ve düşman kumpaslarına karşı koruma ihsan ettiğini söyler. İmparatorluk'ta neye inanılacağını kontrol etme mücadelesi içindeki Ekleşiarşi ise bu tip söylentileri yayanları da, Hür Tacir'in yaşayan bir aziz ilan edilmesini talep edenleri de cezalandırmıştır.
